content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am very happy to hear that you are interested in renting it. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will pay on time every month. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease, which would give me a discount on the rental price. Does that sound like a good deal to you?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to sign a long-term lease and I am open to considering it. However, as a landlord, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. Would you be able to provide me with a specific rental price that you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month for the apartment. I can sign a long-term lease of 12 months, which would give me a discount of 50 Euros per month. I am also reliable and responsible, so I am sure I will pay on time every month. Thanks for considering my offer.
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month for the apartment, if you agree to the terms of the lease agreement that I will provide you.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to sign a long-term lease and I am open to discussing the terms of the lease agreement. However, as a landlord, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. I would like to discuss the terms of the lease agreement with you further before making a final decision. Would you be available to meet with me later this week to discuss the details?
name: Heinrich Heine
